meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the January 15, 2025 City Council Meeting
Consideration of appointments to boards and commissions
agenda_items.description: Evaluation and duties of board and commission members (List of nominees is available in the City Secretary's Office)

agenda_items.title: Review of 2024 Community Survey Results and 2025 Community Survey Approach
Attorney Briefing
agenda_items.description: Seeking the advice of the City Attorney regarding: City of Corsicana, Navarro County, and Navarro College v. City of Dallas

agenda_items.title: Real Estate and Attorney Briefing
agenda_items.description: Deliberate the purchase, exchange, lease, or value of real property located at multiple addresses due to potential detrimental effects on negotiations.
